title: zoe-bot
description: Discord bot that traverses through the Riot Games API; processes user input into game information with customizable real-time output. 100% serverless, with resources being provisioned through a tailored CI/CD pipeline. Fully tested with demonstrated scalability and resilience. Currently serving 30+ Discord guilds worldwide.

title: discord-active-developer-badge
description: Discord slash bot template intended to be hosted on Replit. Offers a way to obtain the Discord Active Developer Badge without any programming.

title: MadCourseEvaluator
description: Web application that compiles information about information at classes at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. Information is retrieved from the University of Wisconsin-Madison course page, Madgrades, Rate My Professors, and Reddit.

title: grades-analysis
description: Analysis of maths grades and the variables affecting student drop out rate.

title: covid-19-analysis
description: Analysis of COVID-19 and the correlation between population density and positive cases.

title: nfl-database
description: Database of all NFL players in the 2020 season. Allows user to look up specific player statistics and add them to a personalized list.
